rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows facing the west for natural light and Vastu balance. Features eco-friendly design elements such as energy efficient LED lighting and sustainable materials.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Cozy dining area integrated with the living space. Open layout encourages family interaction and natural ventilation.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen designed with energy-efficient appliances and eco-friendly materials, featuring a south-east corner placement for prosperity as per Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Primary bedroom with ample natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows. Oriented towards the north-east for positive energy flow and Vastu compliance.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Second bedroom with sufficient space and eco-friendly finishes. Positioned to maintain privacy and airflow.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Third bedroom intended for guest use or additional family member needs, integrating Vastu guidelines for comfort.
